group_1.textRight: Prices of lives...?

group_1.textLeft: Which means, the price for my and Chiharu's lives...?
...Yes.
There was a recording of a conversation with an unknown man...
Though it was hard to understand at first,
I gradually realized that they were talking about a @wish made upon becoming a Diviner...

group_1.textRight: Who was on the other side...?

group_1.textLeft: At least for the file I listened to, I only heard his @voice. No name or anything...
But I'm sure he was someone very high-ranking...
She was talking to him about the price of the wish...@and the time frame for it...
In short, our wishes... Our lives were sold...
*Sigh*...
Sorry for asking about it like that... @You were holding on harder than I thought...

group_1.textRight: So we didn't wish for the Land of the Rising Sun...?

group_1.textLeft: ...That fact doesn't change.

group_1.textRight: But, Granny made us make our wishes so she'd get money for it...
I didn't sacrifice my life to a god...
My life was just sold to some faceless man...
...What was my wish, in the end...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it might've been sold. @Even so... Even so, Charu...
Your wish did come true, and foiled the evil nesting within justice...

group_1.textRight: Shizuka...

group_1.textLeft: So, it did come true... It did, Charu...!

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
By the way, Sunao... How much was I worth...?

group_1.textLeft: Charu, stop... You don't need to hear about that...
Yeah. You don't have any price.

group_1.textRight: Liar...

group_1.textLeft: I'd never put a price on my friends.
This doesn't change anything about either of you. @You're the greatest people I know.
Who cares...about some price...?

group_1.textRight: Sunaooo...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you...
I'm sorry for making you bear that... You're@the greatest person I know, too...

group_1.textRight: Even though I tried to kill you...?

group_1.textLeft: Of course.

group_1.textCenter: So in the end, Mikoshiba knew everything, and was even controlling the Devil...
And this village has been selling people's lives since ancient times...

group_1.textRight: Shizuka, that's not true...
This village belongs to us Tokime. We don't know @what it was like before Mikoshiba's clan came...
Though we can't ask her any more, of course. @Dead men tell no tales...
At this point...at this point, @I'll do whatever I have to...!

group_1.textLeft: Charu, what are you doing?! Stop!
Yes, listen to your mother! It doesn't matter how evil she wasâ€• a dead person's dead!

group_1.textRight: That's not it...!
I said it still smells just a minute ago, didn't I?!
Granny might be dead, but there's still a villain's @smell coming from her!

group_1.textLeft: But what can we do about that?

group_1.textRight: That thing called 'truth' always lies much closer than you expect.
If she left that data in the computer Sunao @found,
then she might have carried the really important @things with her, right?

group_1.textLeft: I see... Here, I'll try searching...
...Excuse me.

group_1.textRight: Is there...anything there...?

group_1.textLeft: Something in her pocket...

group_1.textRight: There was...

group_1.textLeft: ...This is...?
A book...? What's this weird script...?

group_1.textRight: I don't know...

group_1.textLeft: If it's unreadable, I suppose it's another dead end...

group_1.textRight: This is...!
If you want to be Mr. Todoroki, you'll need brains as well.
So you'd better study up on your classic literature,@like you promised!

group_1.textLeft: Errgh. Why's it have to be classics, of all things?

group_1.textRight: You have to! It's the Hiroe family tradition.

group_1.textLeft: A tradition that'll end with my generation, if I have anything to say about it...

group_1.textRight: Mom!!

group_1.textLeft: We...can read it...!
No way...

group_1.textRight: It's always been our family rule that we have to learn this script...

group_1.textLeft: But we never expected to see it here, of all places...
You...can decipher it?

group_1.textRight: I bet we can...!

group_1.textLeft: We'll leave the deciphering to you, then. @We're going to go call everyone else.
All the villagers are still taking shelter.
We ought to lay Mikoshiba down in her own house, too...

group_1.textRight: Understood...

group_1.textLeft: Then, Charu... Please...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I'll do my best! Let's read it, Mom.

group_1.textLeft: Right. I expect we'll be up all night with this...
